Insurance

Class CarPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Insurance.Policy
      • Insurance.CarPolicy

  • public class CarPolicy
extends Policy
    Car policy class that inherits the policy class and holds all the information and methods regarding the Car policies Ashley Moore - 18/02/2013
     

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Insurance.Policy

        policyNumber, year, yearOfPolicy

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarPolicy

        public CarPolicy(double vehicleValue,
         int driversAge,
         int yearsNoClaim,
         boolean fullyComp,
         java.lang.String polNum,
         int yearPol)
          throws IllegalPolicyException
        Default car policy constructor which takes 6 parameters, setting the objects fields to the corresponding parameter values
        Parameters:
        vehicleValue - the value of the car
        driversAge - the age of the driver
        yearsNoClaim - the amount of no claims
        fullyComp - fully comp - true or false
        polNum - the policy ID
        yearPol - year of the policy
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - exception error
